wgIpsecEndpointPairModule.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairModule
wgIpsecEndpointPairModule.contactinfo: Ella Yu WatchGuard Technologies, Inc. 1841 Zanker Road San Jose, CA 95112 USA 408-519-4888 ella.yu@watchguard.com
wgIpsecEndpointPairModule.description: The MIB module describes generic Ipsec Endpoint Pair information of WatchGuard system. Mainly, the information obtained from this MIB is used to constructed topological view of IPSec security gateways that are connected by IPSec tunnels. An IPSec Endpoint Pair is a pair of security gateways that are connected with 0 or more IPSec SA's in tunnel mode. It contains information of aggregated information of tunnel mode SA's between two security gateways. An IPSec Endpoint Pair is identified by a pair of IP addresses. Therefore, if an IPSec security gateway X has 2 external IP addresses while IPsec secruity gateway Y has 3 external IP addresses, there are potentially 6 IPsec Endpoint Pairs between X and Y.

wgIpsecEndpointPairMIB.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairMIB
wgIpsecEndpointPairMIB.description: This is the base object identifier for all IPSec tunnel branches.

wgIpsecEndpointPair.name: wgIpsecEndpointPair
wgIpsecEndpointPair.description: This is the base object identifier for all IPSec tunnel information.

wgIpsecEndpointPairStatistics.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairStatistics
wgIpsecEndpointPairStatistics.description: This is the base object identifier for all objects which are global counters for IPSec tunnels.

wgIpsecEndpointPairNum.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairNum
wgIpsecEndpointPairNum.description: The total number of entries in the wgIpsecEndpointPairTable.

wgIpsecEndpointPairTable.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairTable
wgIpsecEndpointPairTable.description: This is the connection table describing all current IPSec tunnels exist on this entity.

wgIpsecEndpointPairEntry.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairEntry
wgIpsecEndpointPairEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) containing the information on a IPSec tunnel between two IPSec security gateways.

wgIpsecEndpointPairIndex.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairIndex
wgIpsecEndpointPairIndex.description: The running index of this IPSec endpoint pair.

wgIpsecEndpointPairLocalAddr.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairLocalAddr
wgIpsecEndpointPairLocalAddr.description: The local IP address of the current IPSec ednpoint pair.

wgIpsecEndpointPairPeerAddr.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairPeerAddr
wgIpsecEndpointPairPeerAddr.description: The remote IP address of the current IPSec endpoint pair.

wgIpsecEndpointPairInSAs.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairInSAs
wgIpsecEndpointPairInSAs.description: The number of inbound IPSEC SA's within this IPSec endpoint pair.

wgIpsecEndpointPairOutSAs.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairOutSAs
wgIpsecEndpointPairOutSAs.description: The number of outbound IPSEC SA's within this IPSec endpoint pair.

wgIpsecEndpointPairInAccKbytes.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairInAccKbytes
wgIpsecEndpointPairInAccKbytes.description: Total inbound traffic in Kbytes since the establish of this connection.

wgIpsecEndpointPairOutAccKbytes.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairOutAccKbytes
wgIpsecEndpointPairOutAccKbytes.description: Total outound traffic in Kbytes since the establish of this connection.

wgIpsecEndpointPairInPackets.description: Total number of inbound packets since the establish of this connection.

wgIpsecEndpointPairOutPackets.description: Total number of outound packets since the establish of this connection.

wgIpsecEndpointPairDecryptErrors.description: Total number of packets discarded due to decryption error since the establish of this connection.

wgIpsecEndpointPairAuthErrors.description: Total number of packets discarded due to authentication error since the establish of this connection.

wgIpsecEndpointPairReplayErrors.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairReplayErrors
wgIpsecEndpointPairReplayErrors.description: Total number of packets discarded due to replay error since the establish of this connection.

wgIpsecEndpointPairPolicyErrors.description: Total number of packets discarded due to policy error since the establish of this connection.

wgIpsecEndpointPairPadErrors.description: Total number of packets discarded due to pad value error since the establish of this connection.

wgIpsecEndpointPairOtherReceiveErrors.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairOtherReceiveErrors
wgIpsecEndpointPairOtherReceiveErrors.description: The number of packets discarded due to errors other than decryption, authentication or replay errors. This may include packets dropped due to a lack of receive buffers, and may include packets dropped due to congestion at the decryption element.

wgIpsecEndpointPairSendErrors.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairSendErrors
wgIpsecEndpointPairSendErrors.description: The number of packets discarded due to any error. This may include errors due to a lack of transmit buffers.

wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalInSAs.description: The total number of active inbound SA's in the entity.

wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalOutSAs.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalOutSAs
wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalOutSAs.description: The total number of active outbound SA's in the entity.

wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalDecryptErrors.description: Total number of packets on this entity discarded due to encryption error.

wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalAuthErrors.description: Total number of packets on this entity discarded due to authentication errors.

wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalReplayErrors.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalReplayErrors

wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalPadErrors.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalPadErrors
wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalPadErrors.description: Total number of packets on this entity discarded due to pad value error.

wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalOtherReceiveErro.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalOtherReceiveErrors
wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalOtherReceiveErro.description: The total number of packets on this entity discarded due to errors other than decryption, authentication or replay errors. This may include packets dropped due to a lack of receive buffers, and may include packets dropped due to congestion at the decryption element.

wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalSendErrors.name: wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalSendErrors
wgIpsecEndpointPairTotalSendErrors.description: The total number of packets discarded due to any error on this entity.

wgIpsecEndpointPairPeerIPToTunnelEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) containing the peer ip and tunnel information.
